diff --git a/deploy.sh b/deploy.sh
@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@
+#!/bin/sh
+
+set -eux
+
+host="$1"
+tarball="$2"
+
+basedir="${tarball%.*}"
+
+ssh "$host" tar -C /opt/services/livegrep -xzv < "$tarball"
+ssh "$host" ln -nsf "$basedir" /opt/services/livegrep/current
+ssh "$host" sudo svc -t /etc/service/livegrep*
